title: Florida woman arrested outside Mar-a-Lago with 'message' for Trump
shortDescription: Driving with a suspended license and firearms in the car, Caroline Shaw of Orlando was arrested outside Mar-a-Lago on July 7.

title: What is featured in Trump's Cabinet Room tour?
shortDescription: Trump has also been on a mission to give the White House a facelift, from blinging out the Oval Office in gold accents to redoing the Rose Garden

title: Trump slaps tariffs on copper imports and teases pharmaceutical tax
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said pharmaceutical imports would face a "very high rate, like 200%" and he would impose the tariff at a later date.

title: Trump bill hikes endowment tax for Harvard, other Ivies
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's massive tax and spending package levies a hefty tax on the universities with the largest endowments.

title: Trump administration grilled on Epstein memo
shortDescription: The Justice Department has released a memo on Jeffrey Epstein, declaring there is no "client list" despite the attorney general's past mentions of it.

title: President Trump criticizes Russian President Putin
shortDescription: President Trump expressed his frustration with Russian President Putin after calls between the leaders failed to seal a peace deal with Ukraine.

title: Federal government layoffs: Supreme Court sides with Trump for now
shortDescription: A U.S. district judge in San Francisco had temporarily blocked large-scale federal layoffs known as "reductions in force."

title: Trump analyzes NYC mayoral race but declines to support a candidate
shortDescription: Trump discussed New York City's mayoral race during a Cabinet meeting but said he was 'not getting involved' in endorsing any candidates.

title: Trump lashes out for question on Epstein and video's missing minute
shortDescription: The FBI and the Justice Department said their investigation had concluded that the Epstein had died by suicide

title: Trump supporters, Musk riled over FBI, DOJ's Epstein report
shortDescription: Key MAGA movement figures are calling for the resignation of Trump's top law officials over recent developments in the Jeffrey Epstein case.

title: What to know about the Nobel Peace Prize as Netanyahu nominates Trump
shortDescription: Israeli leader Benjamin Netanyahu nominated Trump for a Nobel Peace Prize. Is he eligible to win one? Who chooses the winners? What to know.

title: Trump says he's not worried about Elon Musk's third party
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he's not worried about the political ramifications of Elon Musk's new political party.

title: No more tax on Social Security? Is new Trump bill tax relief for seniors?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has long touted eliminating taxes on Social Security. His administration says he has achieved it, but the bill says otherwise.

title: Trump rips Putin, says Russian leader 'killing a lot of people'
shortDescription: Trump said at a Cabinet meeting that he was "not happy" with Putin, who he forcefully criticized for a second day in a row.

title: 'No extensions': Trump vows his new tariff deadline is a firm one
shortDescription: President Trump says he's not extending his latest deadline for higher tariffs beyond Aug. 1, when he's warned new countries will pay higher rates.

title: Trump set to visit flood-ravaged Texas on Friday
shortDescription: President Trump said he would visit Texas on July 11 as the state reels after more than 100 people have been confirmed dead in devastating flooding.

title: Trump announces new tariff rates
shortDescription: The new tariff rates on 14 countries, with more to come, will take effect August 1st, extending the former start date by three weeks.

title: Trump admin blasted for troops in LA park
shortDescription: California officials condemned the presence of troops in MacArthur Park. The Defense Department said they were there to back up federal agents.

title: Butler residents desperate for answers year after Trump rally shooting
shortDescription: July 13 marks one year since the FBI said Thomas Crooks fired 8 rounds at Donald Trump and rallygoers, killing one man and grazing Trump's ear.

title: Trump will send more weapons to Ukraine
shortDescription: The president made the promise to send more weapons to Ukraine after a "disappointing" call with Russian President Vladimir Putin.

title: 'Trump Effect' website takes credit for US investment made under Biden
shortDescription: A Reuters review found that just under half of the claimed spending on the website originated under Joe Biden or represented routine spending.

title: Trump, Netanyahu look to relocate Palestinians to other countries
shortDescription: Trump and Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said they were looking for countries to accept Palestinians from Gaza.
